scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
scripts.publish: npm run build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://onicalc.com && npm run image-cache
scripts.image-cache: aws s3 cp s3://onicalc.com/images/ s3://onicalc.com/images/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE --expires 2028-01-01T00:00:00Z --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000,s-maxage=31536000,public
scripts.static-cache: aws s3 cp s3://onicalc.com/static/ s3://onicalc.com/static/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE --expires 2028-01-01T00:00:00Z --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000,s-maxage=31536000,public
